name: tkomiya24.GitHub.io
body:
## Welcome!!
Thanks for taking the time to check this page out. Below, I'll list some of the stuff I've been tinkering with, the technologies they use, where you can see them live, and where you can find the repo! Enjoy,
- Takeru @tkomiya24

### hobby_site
#### Hosted [here](http://hobby-site.herokuapp.com/) on Heroku
This is a site that will help people form teams or groups. I'm initially starting with people who play instruments who are looking to form a band. You register, tell the site which instrument(s) you play and search, browse, and review other users.  

Some tech this app uses
* MySQL 5
* Rails 4
* Ruby 2.2
* Bootstrap 3

### VocabTester
#### Hosted [here](http://vocab-tester.heroku.com/) on Heroku
This is a site that I made for fun to help me learn a new language. You register, create lists of words that you want to learn, and can take a test. The app keeps track of how many times you've gotten a word right or wrong.  

Some tech this app uses
* MongoDB 3
* NodeJS
* ExpressJS
* Mongoose
* AngularJS 1
* Grunt
* SASS
* Bootstrap

### You can check out my full repo over [here](@tkomiya24)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
